64a733e6-7d0a-45c2-9ec7-0ec87ce8243c.text: # NEAR Protocol Developer Guide ![DEVHUB](https://neardevhub.org/) ![CALENDAR](https://bit.ly/near-dev-calendar) ![DEV SUPPORT](https://t.me/addlist/VyVjNaP190JlOGMx) ![NEWSLETTER](https://newsletter.neardevhub.org/) ![FEEDBACK](https://github.com/orgs/near/discussions/new?category=dev-feedback) > NEAR is dedicated to providing the best developer experience possible for building an open web. This mission is next to impossible to achieve without feedback and contributions from **people like you**. ü´µ > > **Get involved!** üëâ please select one of the options above or contribute to one of the essential developer repositories listed below üôè > ---

530c6a7d-514e-4ee1-a7c7-a29bdc435f18.text:
# Ecosystem Organizations

This document lists various NEAR ecosystem nodes and workgroups, their responsibilities and a way to contact them. Contributions: send PR to add your organization with responsibility and contact details.

7fef8129-f9e1-43be-b524-f55958a95839.text:
## Nodes

| Node | Responsibility | Contact |
| - | - | - |
| NEAR Foundation | Coordinating and funding the NEAR ecosystem development | People |
| NEAR Foundation/Horizon | Horizon is an 8 week equity-free accelerator that provides multi-faceted support for early stage Web3 projects | Apply to next cohort |
| Pagoda | Development of various core components of NEAR ecosystem | Contact |
| NEAR One | Protocol development team, maintainers of nearcore | Zulip chat |
| NEAR Dev Hub | Supporting open source development on NEAR from developer education to maintaining core components | Create proposal |
| NEARWEEK | The Official NEAR Newsletter & Community Platform ‚ãà Research. Development. Aggregation. Curation. | Request support | 
| Proximity | Chain Abstraction go to market team | Email |
| Learn NEAR Club | Connects NEAR Ecosystem projects to pro-active community members | Join as Project |
| Mintbase | NFT Creator suite, market, and developer templates to build AI + NFT apps fast| Apply for Grants |
| Potlock | Open funding and impact tracking stack on NEAR dedicated to publicgoods | Community Chat |

We also maintain a database of all entities in the NEAR ecosystem; see the Ecosystem Readme for more information.

c5773945-0dfc-48bc-9ad4-b610bc05deb6.text:
## Work groups

| Work group | Responsibility | Contact |
| - | - | - |
| Protocol Work Group | Responsible for decisions about NEAR blockchain protocol improvements and updates | New issue |
| Infrastructure Work Group | Responsible for funding core infrastructure of NEAR protocol | Telegram |
| Contract Standards Work Group | Responsible for decisions regarding Contract Standards on NEAR, voting on related NEPs, and providing attestations on related funding proposals | Community Telegram |
| Protocol Work Group | Responsible for decisions regarding the NEAR Protocol, voting on related NEPs, and setting the protocol budget | Community Telegram |
| Zero Knowledge Work Group | Responsible for decisions regarding Zero Knowledge related proposals | Community Telegram |
| Hackathon Work Group | Responsible for decisions regarding hackathons and technical event proposals | Community Telegram |
| Validators Work Group | Responsible for decisions regarding validator related proposals and updates | Community Telegram |
